HomePage.name: Jose Navarro
HomePage.tagline: I transform data into intelligent models that drive decisions, automation, and real value.

AboutPage.title: About me
AboutPage.description1: I am a professional electronic engineer with a strong affinity for software engineering and a deep passion for building robust, intelligent, and impactful digital systems. My work bridges software engineering, data science, and IoT, and I thrive at the intersection of hardware and high-level applications.
AboutPage.description2: Over the years, I have developed full-stack applications for mobile, web, and desktop using Flutter, integrating them with real-time IoT devices and scalable backend systems powered by MongoDB. I enjoy owning the entire product development lifecycle — from architecture and development to deployment and user-centered iteration.
AboutPage.description3: As a Machine Learning Engineer, I’ve also designed recommendation systems and deployed predictive models using FastAPI, always aiming for seamless integration between data and user experience. I value clean code, intelligent systems, and thoughtful design as much as the real-world impact my work can have.
AboutPage.description4: Beyond the technical aspects, I’m driven by curiosity and a genuine love for learning. I’m especially fascinated by the convergence of software, hardware, data, and automation — areas in which I constantly seek to deepen my expertise. When I’m not coding, you’ll find me exploring new technologies, reading AI papers, or working on personal projects that blend hardware and code.
AboutPage.exp1: Full Stack Cross-Platform Developer with IoT Focus
AboutPage.exp1_descr: I designed and developed a comprehensive tech solution aimed at preventing physiological risks in work environments, building a mobile, web, and desktop application using Flutter. I integrated this solution with a real-time IoT device that collected physiological data, managing its efficient storage using MongoDB. Additionally, I implemented interactive data visualizations to facilitate user interpretation. I led all stages of MVP development, from requirement definition to validation, prioritizing features through an iterative, user-experience-driven approach.
AboutPage.exp1_skills: Flutter, MongoDB, IoT, Full Stack, Cross-platform, REST API, Data Visualization, MVP, UX/UI, Interactive Charts, Multiplatform Development, Agile Development
AboutPage.exp2_skills: Python, FastAPI, Machine Learning, REST API, E-commerce, JSON, Data Validation, Client-Server Communication, Recommender Systems, MVP, Frontend-Backend Integration, Cross-functional Collaboration
AboutPage.exp2_descr: As an intern, I developed a web-based recommendation system using Machine Learning to personalize the user experience in an e-commerce setting. I built a REST API with FastAPI to serve predictive models, integrating backend and frontend into a seamless interface using optimized JSON structures. I actively contributed to the functional design of the MVP, applying user testing and business feedback to iterate on the product. I collaborated with both technical and non-technical teams, clearly communicating the scope and limitations of the implemented models.
AboutPage.footer_contact_phrase: Every great project starts with a conversation. You can contact me at
